subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: That General Manager Brian Cashman inquired about Carl Pavano after the aggravation Pavano caused the Yankees from 2005 to 2008 only underlines Cashman’s limited options as he tries to find more pitchers.
snippet: That General Manager Brian Cashman inquired about Carl Pavano after the aggravation Pavano caused the Yankees from 2005 to 2008 only underlines Cashman’s limited options as he tries to find more pitchers.
